attributes.action: save Neighbours from being axed by the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that taking Neighbours off the BBC and allowing the rights to be bought by a different channel would ignore the wishes of a vast number of license fee payers. Noone wants an advertisement break in the middle of gripping storylines. Keep neighbours on the BBC!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
